participant_1.background:
I like to cook for my family and friends because it allows me to relax and be creative.
i am not social.
My spouse is my manager and helps me with my career as a lead singer.
I am moving to a new city to pursue my dreams.
I am passionate about capturing the beauty of the world around me, even when I'm not feeling well.

participant_2.background:
I order my food on the phone so that I can stay in my pajamas the whole time.
My favorite websites are the ones that help me learn about skiing and the mountains.
my favorite thing to do is float the river.
i am currently single.
I ride my bicycle every day to keep fit and to clear my head so I can focus on my writing.

content.text: Doing good! I'm in the process of moving to a new city.
Oh nice! Where are you moving to?
I'm moving to Denver! I'm really excited to start my new job there.
That's awesome! I've heard great things about Denver.
Yeah, it seems like a really great place to live. I'm looking forward to exploring it.
What kind of work do you do?
I'm a lead singer for a band. We're moving there to pursue our music dreams.
That's so cool! What kind of music do you play?
We play a mix of rock and roll, blues, and country.
Oh, that sounds really cool! I love all of those genres.
Yeah, we're a pretty eclectic band. We like to mix things up.
That's awesome! I'm sure you'll do great in Denver. There's a lot of great music there.
Thanks! We're really excited to get started.
